node.title: Morning scratching sees Melbourne Cup field drop to 23 riders
node.description: A late scratching on the morning of the race that stops a nation sees the field reduced by one, asÂ Incentivise heads into this year's Melbourne Cup as one of the shortest priced favourites since Phar Lap. Follow live.
node.content: ["Incentivise heads into this year's Melbourne Cup as one of the shortest priced favourites since Phar Lap.\u00a0", "Meanwhile, Twilight Payment aims to be the first horse to win consecutive Cups since Makybe Diva.", "Follow all of the action during the 2021 Melbourne Cup on our live blog."]
